ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Slashing weapons for bards question...
ygData.msgSnippet: Maximumeq lists the going rate at around 450 pp.  A bit out of my price range yet.  Seems to me tho, that PROCing weapons should be a bard s first choice.  We
ygData.messageBody:
Maximumeq lists the going rate at around 450 pp. A
bit out of my price range yet. Seems to me tho, that
PROCing weapons should be a bard's first choice. We
already have a high dex so why not capitalize?


--- Sigma111 <sigma7@...> wrote:
> How much was the shard, if I may ask?
>
> I see them go for 1000p sometimes, but mabey that is
> just
> a fluke?
>
> Probably not though...:|
>
>
>
> > From: "Cranfill, Wendy"
> <Wendy_Cranfill@...>
> >
> > Yeah, I just got my obsidian shart, and like wow,
> that proc makes a very
> > satisfying BOOM!
> >
> > Tani, 21st (wow, I die a LOT in Mistmoore) Bard
> > Halana, 50th (no matter what people say, loot
> matters to them) Shaman
> > Solusek Ro
> >
> > P.S. Macgrough, Halana has your gloves all ready
> :) just let me know when
> > you're on
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Kevin L. Crawford [mailto:Lyrnia@...]
> > Sent: Friday, March 24, 2000 9:15 AM
> > To: eqbards@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [eqbards] Slashing weapons for bards
> question...
> >
> >
> > From: "Kevin L. Crawford" <Lyrnia@...>
> >
> > Bards can't use 2hslash... well we can, but our
> skill is capped at 1 ;)
> >
> > What you need to do is get a 1hb a pierce and a
> 1hs weapon. Keep all 3
> > skills maxxed ;)
> >
> > 1HB: One of the best bard weapons in the game
> (till much higher levels)
> is
> > the Staff of Writhing. 9dmg 33dly and a 48dmg
> proc that also interrupts
> > spell casters. The staff starts proc'ing at level
> 28. The only real
> > drawback to this weapon is the -9 charisma hit.
> But once your charisma is
> > up in the 130 range you really won't notice the
> penalty that much and the
> > staff is more than worth it if you are using melee
> combat. Another good
> 1hb
> > is the BEM (Black Enamelled Mace) I believe it's
> 8dmg 28dly
> >
> > 1HS: Uhh tons of good stuff
> > Pierce: Some of the nicer ones are the Dragoon
> Dirk and the Obsidian
> shard.
> > There are others as well.
> >
> > That way you can use whatever weapon comes along
> ;)
> >
> > Lyrnia Jongleur
> > Bard of Norrath
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: "Sigma111" <sigma7@...>
> > To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
> > Sent: Friday, March 24, 2000 10:43 AM
> > Subject: [eqbards] Slashing weapons for bards
> question...
> >
> >
> > > From: "Sigma111" <sigma7@...>
> > >
> > >
> > > Ok, for those who missed the last post, I am a
> level 7, almost 8 bard.
> > > Right now I am using a regular Long Sword. Not
> too dramatic..:)
> > >
> > > I know I get dual wield at 17, and that sounds
> nice but I was wondering
> > > what it maxes out at and if its better to get
> dual wield for 2 1h
> slashers
> > > or to invest in a 2h slasher like a bibs?
> > >
> > > thanks!
> > >
> > > Cerulia
> > > Bard of 7.8 songs, Fennin Ro
> > >
> > >
> > >
> > >
> > >
>
